channel.title: Help Please ! Maybe Easy For You Guys
channel.description:
Well , i got a source from the downloads section downloaded it extracted to my desktop and then created a no-ip downloaded this also and ticked the box .. i downloaded a 317 source and client and i want to use this when i change the IP to put my IP in this case mine is * and my username and password it just says ' Error Connecting To Server ' i have also tryed it on my friends computer and his does the same
Any Help Please Would Be Thankfull :)
Thanks

item.title: Help Please ! Maybe Easy For You Guys
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“clarkie1122, post:4, topic:298460”]ok i messaged you ’ Vaonaman ’

Rich , hmm what you mean connect to 127.0.0.1 i not very good at server i quit for few years lost my touch :S[/quote]

Hard to believe you quit for a few years, when you can’t properly type/spell… You’d need to be able to in order to code anything worthwhile. And you mean, Server Coding*

Read full topic
item.source: Help Please ! Maybe Easy For You Guys

item.title: Help Please ! Maybe Easy For You Guys

item.description:
@celiano wrote:

Go in to youre client folder and open Gui notepad and search for no-ip and change et in to 127.0.0.1 to connect
buth if u want that others be able to connect use ur ip ore no-ip

item.title: Help Please ! Maybe Easy For You Guys
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Connect to 127.0.0.1

and if you want others to be able to connect, then follow the ‘How to make a server’ guide in the tutorial section.
